title: Borak Polytechnic Institute
description: A role-based online education platform for Students, Teachers, and Admins with secure authentication and course management.
technologies: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT, Firebase Auth, Node js , Stripe
features: Students can enroll in courses, view content, and track progress
Teachers can manage courses, upload materials, and interact with students
Admin can oversee the platform, manage users, and handle content moderation

title: Hotel Booking Platform
description: A hotel booking platform with room listings, booking management, and reviews built with MERN stack.

title: Plant Care Tracker
description: A full-stack plant care tracking app with user authentication and CRUD features built with MERN stack.
